title: How to Make Egg Strips

steps.headline: Place 1 to 2 eggs into a bowl.
Pour the mixture into a frying pan with butter or oil.
steps.description: Cook in the same way as a crepe. However, do not turn the egg until it is almost set.

steps.headline: Turn over the egg, remove from the heat, and set aside to cool.
Roll the cooled egg into a cylinder shape.
Cut across the cylinder horizontally.
steps.description: Space each slice about one inch/ 2 centimeter (0.8 in) apart.

steps.headline: Put the egg strips onto your dish as required.

text: Place 1 to 2 eggs into a bowl.  Add a tablespoon of milk.  Lightly beat the eggs together.  Pour the mixture into a frying pan with butter or oil. Cook in the same way as a crepe. However, do not turn the egg until it is almost set. Turn over the egg, remove from the heat, and set aside to cool.  Roll the cooled egg into a cylinder shape.  Cut across the cylinder horizontally. Space each slice about one inch/ 2 centimeter (0.8 in) apart. Put the egg strips onto your dish as required.
